Menace
[i]A Living Nightmare – [/i]When Lisa enters, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland nonlegendary permanent card. That card gains effigy and you may cast it until end of turn. [i](As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a token that shares a card type with it. If you do, this spell costs {2} less to cast.)[/i]
